chunks.content: Today the college, housed in the Fitzpatrick, Cushing, and Stinson-Remick Halls of Engineering, includes five departments of study â€“ aerospace and mechanical engineering, chemical and biomolecular engineering, civil engineering and geological sciences, computer science and engineering, and electrical engineering.

metadata.relevance_reason: This part directly states the number of departments within the College of Engineering, which includes Stinson-Remick Hall.
metadata.answer_contribution: It specifies that there are five departments of study.
